author: cheerful_piglet_95568
content:
Hi team, Does the below status means that the node is fully synced or that it stopped syncing due to some issue?

geth attach http://127.0.0.1:8545/
Welcome to the Geth JavaScript console!

instance: Geth/v1.10.18-stable-de23cf91/linux-amd64/go1.16.8
at block: 0 (Thu Jan 01 1970 00:00:00 GMT+0000 (UTC))
 modules: debug:1.0 eth:1.0 net:1.0 rpc:1.0 web3:1.0

To exit, press ctrl-d or type exit
eth.syncing
false

author: cheerful_piglet_95568
content:
